base.$description: Deep Space Void - primary app background. Darker, richer, slightly cooler than standard dark mode.

surface.$description: Midnight Glass - translucent surface for cards. Needs backdrop-filter blur to work.

card.$description: Glass card surface - very subtle white tint. Requires blur and border for definition.

elevated.$description: Elevated glass surface for modals/hover. Slightly more opaque.

coral.$description: Coral Glow - warmth, friendliness. Used for mesh gradients and glow effects.

sky.$description: Sky Blue - primary action glow. Electric and optimistic.

lilac.$description: Hype Lilac - deep thoughts and magic moments.

citrus.$description: Sunshine - high energy sparks and highlights.

primary.$description: Primary text - pure white for maximum contrast on glass.

secondary.$description: Secondary text - translucent white instead of grey.

on-accent.$description: Text on bright accents - dark void color for contrast.

highlight.$description: Top edge highlight for glass cards.

aurora.$description: Top-down blue glow for the void.
